channel.title: Important questions! please help!
channel.description:
i have 2 questions that i need help with.
1. everytime i log into a server, it lets me play but then it loses connection and when i try logging back in, it says server is down or offline. btw i'm using morparscape webclient. I clicked change port. so i thought that i should be ok.
2. why do you need to download p servers? and how do you play them from dled file? i have a run server.BAT but when i click it, it says something something error, press any key to continue... but when i press a key nothing happens.
help me please.
~thanks.

item.title: Important questions! please help!
item.dc:creator: @UNKNOWN2002 UNKNOWN2002
item.description:
@UNKNOWN2002 wrote:

Get an auto-restarter for your server from the tut section. I know Mr Quarter made one.
